To Reflect About

You start dying slowly
Fear is not real
I see mountains as mountains
Journey and destination
The path of aloneness
Your life is your life
Go all the way
Bodhisattva way of life
Consumerism and life time
Danger of science denial
Essence of simplicity
I set my hearth on learning
Internationalization of Amazonia
Investment of societies
Making work more efficient
Message to future generations
On the pursue of truth
Purpose of religion
Regrets of the dying
Signs of noncompetitive states
The search for reason
The zen of Python
To the crazy ones
Uncopyright mindset
What is happiness?
Who cares about them
